metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30749 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in tvOS 14.6, iOS 14.6 and iPadOS 14.6,Safari 14.1.1, macOS Big Sur 11.4, watchOS 7.5. Processing maliciouslycrafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
